list: Acquire 20% Hosidius favour by ploughing, and then making sulphurous fertiliser
Hand in the diary of Herbi Flax to the Apothecary
Acquire 20% Arceuus favour and use the on
Acquire 100% Arceuus favour by returning dark manuscripts, use the on
Acquire 20% Lovakengj favour by mining and banking volcanic sulphur
Acquire 100% Piscarilius favour by hunting sandworms
Acquire 100% Hosidius favour by creating sulphurous fertiliser
Acquire 100% Lovakengj favour by mining volcanic sulphur (until 75%) and delivering minecart control scrolls
Acquire 100% Shayzien favour by killing lizardmen and in the Shayzien Combat Ring
Acquire 100% Favour in the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame
